dialog: Ya beb, it's totally far out.. I love that OPM record.
Ya beb, it's good. the kids in bed beb, and I just snagged the papa's bourbon
Oh ya Benby, it was totally freaked up. I've never seen so many chainsaws...
And beb... the guys not even a tree surgeon
ya guys payin me 30 bucks an hour just to keep an eye on those scrawny little twiglets.
When the revolution comes he'll be first against the wall
